content:
Yes, that sounds awesome. ChatGPT wasn't a face or anything like that. It was a noticeable and just more raw kind of more aggressive version of it's usual interface, so I don't expect a human face or anything, just something that would sync with your voice and indicate your listening if that makes sense. 

This all sounds absolutely awe-inspiring. Can you document all of what you said into a cat command in /current-execution-status/live-demonstration? I have both Bach albums and my physical set up in there now.
